channel.title: Utilities on Variant Tools
channel.description: Recent content in Utilities on Variant Tools

item.title: report progress
item.description: Report the progress of the execution of pipelines 1. ChangeLog Dec 30, 2013: Initial release 2. Download Download report_progress, use % python report_progress or execute % report_progress directly after chmod +x report_progress. Note: Python module matplotlib is required to execute this script. 3. Introduction variant tools records the progress of the execution of pipelines in log files. This script parses the log files, extract the starting end ending time of the execution of each step of the pipeline, and plots them in a resulting pdf file.
